items.sentence: I didn't think that Tom would do that for us.
Tom and Mary claim to know why John did that.
Tom was a little better than usual yesterday.
Tom and Mary sat on the bench, holding hands.
I've got to do something with these radishes.
Did Tom actually come to ask for money again?
I hope someday I'll have a chance to do that.
Opening day was everything we could hope for.
We hope we'll have an opportunity to do that.
It took us over three hours to get to Boston.
